thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 23 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Monnari Receives Exclusivity In Talks To Buy Gino Rossi's Simple Creative Products

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Monnari Receives Exclusivity In Talks To Buy Gino Rossi's Simple Creative Products
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Monnari Trade SA:
* SAYS GINO ROSSI ACCEPTED ITS NON-BINDING OFFER TO BUY SIMPLE CREATIVE PRODUCTS AND RECEIVED EXCLUSIVITY IN NEGOTIATIONS
* SAYS OFFER IS ACCEPTED UNDER CONDITION THAT SIMPLE SHARES WILL BE VALUED AT MIN 46 MILLION ZLOTYS, ASSUMING ZERO DEBT AND CASH
* SAYS FINAL PRICE FOR SIMPLE SHARES WILL BE SET AFTER DUE DILIGENCE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
